website_summaries.verdict: The Nike Tiempo Rio IV received some harsh criticisms from a few of its users, referring to its overall quality. The Tiempo cleat has some high standards to keep up because it belongs to an iconic Nike lineup. However, the majority of the reviewers commended the soccer cleats for its budget-friendly rate. At its affordable price point, it provides a notable upper sensation and enhanced ball control. For those who are looking for inexpensive cleats for a decent value, the Nike Tiempo Rio IV will surely tick the checklist.
pros: Majority of the users of the Tiempo Rio IV were impressed with its synthetic leather upper finish
Many reviewers agree that the soccer cleat was reasonable for its price
Some players lauded the strike zone molded texture that helped them when controlling the ball
A few users mentioned that the fourth generation Tiempo Rio required minimal break-in time
One user is satisfied with the updated soleplate of the Tiempo Rio IV due to its premium quality and the right amount of thickness
The firm ground soccer cleat is affordable
cons: A few users of the Tiempo Rio IV think that the overall look of the cleat is of low-quality
They used the words “cheap” or “fake” to describe it
One user complained about the poor quality insole support that did not provide enough protection for the sole

customer_reviews.title: fantastic value for money
customer_reviews.text: My early teen son loved these, they look good and fit well. The studs are strong enough not to get worn after just few games (he played around 20 matches and still going strong). The are a little soft in the 'kick' area but that is to be expected for boots in this price range. Overall fantastic value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Ajo

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfy boots and fit nicely. And they have the mandatory “swoosh”!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter (I know I’m a rebel getting Men’s boots for a girl!). She’s very happy, fit nicely and comfortable. Not noticed any significant skill increase on the pitch yet, but there’s time yet....
customer_reviews.author: Nycoy

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Daughter needed football boots, these have been fantastic, look good and robust as have lasted well
customer_reviews.author: ARG2503

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, returned only due to no longer required. No hassle with refund.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs M

customer_reviews.title: They are great
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my son's PE lessons and he is very pleased with these football shoes. Would by them again.
customer_reviews.author: ThreeTop

customer_reviews.title: Great foot ball boots.
customer_reviews.text: I got them for my grandson and hi is so happy with them thanks.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT HODGSON

customer_reviews.title: Buy, lovely fit, look and feel great
customer_reviews.text: Bargain basement price for a good boots. Bought a half size bigger as with all footie boots and fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Kaur

customer_reviews.title: They fit his biggest & he likes them.
customer_reviews.text: Much appreciated by my son who trains & teaches football.
customer_reviews.author: Janette Kipling

customer_reviews.title: Bargain
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are an absolute bargain. Very lightweight and fit like a dream!
customer_reviews.author: Liam Christian

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Needed a solid pair of boots for a rare game perfect
customer_reviews.author: Richard Morgan

customer_reviews.title: A very comfortable boot, which doesn't feel chunky anywhere and so ...
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 9 in casual shoes, but wear these in a 9.5. However this may be more due to football socks etc. A very comfortable boot,which doesn't feel chunky anywhere and so offers good feel and control of the ball. Have worn for around 8 months now playing every week on a 3G pitch and has no signs of tears etc. Great value for money (purchased for £30)
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Wood

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Tiempo Rio Iv Fg Footbal Shoes
product_meta.description: The Nike tiempo rio iv men's football shoe (fg) for normal grass combines the soft feel of textured synthetic leather with a comfortable fit and a durable tpu outsole. The comfortable shape guarantees a comfortable and versatile fit. Soft synthetic leather with foam padding offers a soft feel. The preformed texture creates friction for greater control of the ball. The tongue is fixed on the inside and guarantees a good fit throughout the game. The preformed insole reduces pin pressure for greater comfort. The tpu outsole provides durability and stable traction.
